    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Actividades sobre el teorema de Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Activities about Thales's theorem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten über Theorem Thaless</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités au sujet du théorème de Thales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades sobre o theorem de Thales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività circa il teorema del Thales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες για το θεώρημα Thales</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el teorema de Thales. Se presentan multitud de situaciones en las que se puede aplicar el teorema de Thales para resolver problemas de la vida cotidiana.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain Thales's theorem, showing many situations in which the theorem can be used to solve everyday problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema</string>
            <string language="en">theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulos</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Theorem Thaless, viele Situationen zeigend zu 
erklären, in denen das Theorem verwendet werden kann, um tägliche 
Probleme zu lösen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le théorème de Thales, montrant beaucoup
de situations dans lesquelles le théorème peut être employé pour 
résoudre des problèmes journaliers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o theorem de Thales, mostrando muitas situações em que o theorem 
pode ser usado resolver problemas diários.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare teorema del Thales, mostrante molte situazioni in cui il 
teorema può essere usato per risolvere i problemi giornalieri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει το θεώρημα Thales, που εμφανίζει πολλές 
καταστάσεις στις οποίες το θεώρημα μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για 
να λύσει τα καθημερινά προβλήματα.</string>
          </description>
